Source.Name: libimobiledevice
Source.Summary: A library to communicate with services of Apple iOS devices using native protocols.
Source.Description: libimobiledevice is a cross-platform software library that talks the protocols to support iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad and Apple TV devices.

Package.Name: libimobiledevice
Package.Summary: A library to communicate with services of Apple iOS devices using native protocols.
Package.Description: libimobiledevice is a cross-platform software library that talks the protocols to support iPhone, iPod Touch, iPad and Apple TV devices.
